data: Dr. Priya Kumar works as an Education Consultant.
Dr. Priya Kumar has over 15 years of experience in educational research.
Dr. Priya Kumar has expertise in curriculum design and e-learning platforms.
Dr. Priya Kumar developed national standards for digital literacy.
Dr. Priya Kumar was a keynote speaker at EdTech 2023.
Dr. Priya Kumar authored ten peer-reviewed papers in machine learning and data ethics.
Dr. Priya Kumar is located in Austin, Texas, United States.
Dr. Priya Kumar has skills in curriculum development, research, and public speaking.
